"GossipWars is a peer-to-peer game where each player receives regions on a map and an " "army and the purpose is to gain other territories and neutralize other players's armies" "The game consists of rounds of length set at room creation. During a round, each player " "can do one of the following actions:
" "► move soldiers from a populated region to a neighboring region
" "► attack a region occupied by another player
" "► create alliances
" "► chat with other players inside an alliance
" "► create proposals (join / kick / defend / attack) that must be voted by players " "from the chosen alliance to take action
" "► vote proposals made by allies
" "► negotiate with other players
" "► take round bonus
"

"When the app starts, it looks for other devices to connect through bluetooth. When it " "finds an device, a dialog will appear for requesting pairing. In order to pair," "select accept option.\nNow you or the other players can create rooms by setting the name," "round length and max number of players. The game will start when the room host clicks " "start. All players that joined will enter the game."

"When the game starts, map's regions will be shared between players. Each player has at " "beginning an army of 100k soldiers, with 50xp attack and defense and a region assigned " "as capital. Map regions will have " "a color to distinguish owners.\nActions can be taken when clicking on a region.You can " "attack a region only if you have soldiers in that region. Same condition applies for " "moving soldiers in that region from a neighbor one."

"At beginning there are no alliances.When creating an alliance you must select the first " "member(excepting yourself) and a name. Now you can select one of the alliances you belong " "to read messages and chat with the other allies"

"At the end of every round players will send their actions and the game state will update." "To figure out what happened you can view the content of overview tab, where each fight," "negotiation and troop moving will be displayed."

"In this tab you can make proposals and vote the proposals made by other players." "In order to do a proposal you must belong to at least an alliance.\nFor join and kick " "actions to take action you must get majority from allies votes. For defense and attack " "proposals all players that voted yes will help the proposal initiator during the attack." "Helping means that their soldiers in that region will attack / defend together" "(damage will sum up and loss will be split proportionally).\nYou can also take your round" " bonus if you have a capital and send negotiate proposals to other players."
